nodes.text: The Celanon–Sprizen Negotiation was a trade dispute between the Celanon and Sprizen systems, two star systems that lay along the Celanon Spur hyperlane. Jedi Consulars from the Jedi Order settled the negotiations in favor of the traders from Celanon, though the Great Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, which began in the year 3681 BBY, caused the dispute to reopen when trade boundaries were shifted.
The Celanon–Sprizen Negotiation was first mentioned in the Jedi Consular section of the 2012 reference guide Star Wars: The Old Republic Encyclopedia.
